abstract: The software maker SAP said Monday that it might sell its TomorrowNow business following an announcement that senior managers at the unit, which has embroiled the company in a legal dispute with a rival, Oracle, had resigned.
lead_paragraph: The software maker SAP said Monday that it might sell its TomorrowNow business following an announcement that senior managers at the unit, which has embroiled the company in a legal dispute with a rival, Oracle, had resigned.

headline.main: SAP May Sell Unit as Senior Managers Resign
